testsuite.name: testCase.TC002_LoginUserWithCorrectEmailAndPassword
testsuite.system-out: Navigating to baseURL: http://automationexercise.com Home Page is displayed successfully 'Login to your account' is visible Entered correct email address and password, Clicked 'login' button Login page is displayed Verified that 'Logged in as username' is visible and matched with user name Clicked on 'Delete Account' button and Verified that 'ACCOUNT DELETED!' is visible click on 'Continue'button after delete Account,and Account is deleted successfully
